body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Richard Price and the customer's name is Emily Rivera.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Richard Price and I am with ClearPath Accounting Firm. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Richard, I'm Emily Rivera. I'm calling about a billing issue I noticed on my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your name, Emily. I understand billing issues can be frustrating. Can you please tell me the amount that you were billed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I was billed two hundred fifty dollars, but I thought it was supposed to be less.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see, that does sound concerning. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your Social Security number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. And could you also confirm the date of your last payment?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last payment I made was on August second, twenty twenty-three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I appreciate your help. Let me check your account details regarding the billing discrepancy.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, I'll hold while you do that.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Emily. I've found the issue and we will adjust the billing. Thank you for your time today!
